newsitem.title: FINLAND: TALENTUM TO SELL STAKE IN A/S MEDIA.
newsitem.headline: TALENTUM TO SELL STAKE IN A/S MEDIA.

text.p: Finnish publishing group Talentum Oy said on Monday it would sell its 67 percent stake in Estonian publisher A/S Media back to minority shareholders for an undisclosed sum.
"Talentum's stake (67 percent) will be bought back by A/S Media Oy's minority partners," Talentum said in a statement.
Talentum said its participation in the publication of A/S Media's "Kaubaleht" business periodical had not met the objectives and future business prospects were too small.
Talentum said it had been involved in publishing Kaubaleht for two years, but that the earnings impact had been marginal.
